mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account ( account_reg_no, account_no, bank_code_no, account_holder, account_category_code_no, usage_status_code_no, reference ) VALUES ( seq_account_reg_no.NEXTVAL, #{accountNo}, #{bankCodeNo}, #{accountHolder}, #{accountCategoryCodeNo}, '01' #{reference} )
mapper.select: SELECT account_reg_no, account_no, account_holder, bank_code_no, bank_code_name, reference, account_category_code_no, account_category_code_name FROM account WHERE account_reg_no = #{value}
